嗺字的基本解释

嗺
zuī
撮口作声。
口动的样子。
嗟叹。

嗺
suī
席间祝辞催饮（酒）。
古代大曲的一解。

嗺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zuī］
［《廣韻》臧回切，平灰，精。］
亦作“哸1”。
(1)撮口作声。
(2)嗟叹。
[②]［suī］
［《廣韻》素回切，平灰，心。］
(1)唐宋大曲中的一解。
(2)催饮（酒）。
[③]［zuǐ］
［《廣韻》遵誄切，上旨，精。］
［《廣韻》子于切，平虞，精。］
见“摧嗺”。

嗺字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　嗺； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页204第22
【玉篇】子雖切【正韻】遵綏切，?音追。【玉篇】撮口也。　又【廣韻】素回切【集韻】蘇回切，?音毸。【廣韻】嗺送歌。【集韻】或作哸。　又【集韻】促飮也。【王仁裕詩】芳尊每命管絃嗺。【趙勰交趾事蹟】嗺酒逐歌。　又【集韻】祖回切，音摧嗟也。　又一曰嗺頹，口動貌。　又【集韻】祖猥切，音摧。口醜也。○按山部內嶉字，口部內嗺字，筆畫雖同，字形迥別。今諸韻書義音雜出，如此字係口旁加崔，而《正韻》於遵綏切內云山高貌，亦同崔，《廣韻》子于切，《集韻》遵須切內云高貌，又《廣韻》遵誄切內云山狀，應是嶉字，註不宜溷入，諸韻書疑誤。

嗺字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
嗺字的起名意思

暂无。

嗺
Basic explanation of words
嗺
zuī
Quietly.
The appearance of mouth movement.
Sigh.
嗺
suī
During the banquet, toast to drink (wine).
An explanation of ancient Daqu.
嗺
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zuī］
["Guang Yun" Zang Hui cut, flat gray, fine. ]
Also known as "哸1".
(1) Summoning.
(2) Sigh.
[②]［suī］
["Guangyun" Su Hui cut, flat gray, heart. ]
(1) An explanation in the Tang and Song Daqu.
(2) Drink (wine).
[③] [zuǐ]
["Guangyun" Zunzu cut, purpose, fine. ]
["Guangyun" Zi Yuqie, Pingyu, Jing. ]
See "Destruction".
嗺
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　嗺; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 204 22
[Jade articles] Zi although cut [Zheng Yun] Zun Sui cut, sound chase. [Jade articles] The mouth is also.　[Guangyun] Su Huiqie [Jiyun] Su Huiqie again,? Yin 毸. [Guang Yun] Songs are sent. 【Ji Yun】or Zuo 哸.　[Jiyun] to promote the taste. 【Wang Renyu Poems】Fangzun always lives orchestra. [Zhao Xie's Deeds of Jiaozhi] The wine and the song.　[Jiyun] The ancestor cuts back, and the sound destroys it.　Another said, slumping, with a moving mouth.　[Jiyun] Zuyou cut, sound destroyed. It's also ugly. ○According to Yamabu Neiyu, mouth Neiyu, although the strokes are the same, the fonts are different. Today's rhymes are mixed with meaning and sound, so the word is added Cui beside the mouth, and "Zhengyun" is in Zunsui, and it is the same as Cui, "Guangyun" is in Qi, and "Ji Yun" is in Zunxu. The appearance of the cloud is high, and the "Guangyun" Zunzu cuts the inner cloud and mountain shape. It should be the word 剉, and the note should not be mixed in. The rhyme books are suspected of mistakes.
